item.description:
I forgot to pin down the show time....sorry. We will be seeing the 7:50 showing so lets all meet at 7:15. The movie is showing upstairs so I will be in the area near the coffee/ice cream concession stand. I will try to snag a table. I will be wearing my usual badge so new folks can find me.

Enchanted

PGsome scary images and mild innuendoThe tale follows the beautiful princess Giselle (Amy Adams) as she is banished by an evil queen (Susan Sarandon) from her magical, musical animated land ? and finds herself in the gritty reality of the streets of modern-day Manhattan. Shocked by this strange new environment that doesn?t operate on a happily ever after basis, Giselle is now adrift in a chaotic world badly in need of enchantment. But when Giselle begins to fall in love with a charmingly flawed divorce lawyer (Patrick Dempsey) who has come to her aid ? even though she is already promised to a perfect fairy tale prince (James Marsden) back home ? she has to wonder: Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?Read More

Cast: Amy Adams, Patrick Dempsey, James Marsden, Timothy Spall
Director: Kevin Lima
Genres: Fairy Tales & Legends, Comedy, Family-Oriented Comedy
item.name: Enchanted
